location.zh-cn: 河北省雄安新区容城县
location.en: Rongcheng County, Xiong'an New Area, Hebei Province

description.zh-cn: 河北省公安厅的派出机构，受河北省公安厅和河北雄安新区党工委、管委会双重管理，以新区管理为主，行使设区市公安机关的职权。
description.en: An agency dispatched by the Hebei Provincial Public Security Department, under the dual management of the Hebei Provincial Public Security Department and the Party Working Committee and Management Committee of Hebei Xiong'an New Area, with the New Area's management being primary. It exercises the powers of a public security organ of a prefecture-level city.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任保定市公安局党委副书记、常务副局长，后担任河北雄安新区公安局首任局长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Deputy Secretary of the Party Committee and Executive Deputy Director of the Baoding Public Security Bureau, and later became the first Director of the Hebei Xiong'an New Area Public Security Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 河北省人民政府组成部门，主管全省公安工作。
description.en: A component department of the Hebei Provincial People's Government, in charge of public security work throughout the province.

nodes.id: 河北雄安新区管理委员会

zh-cn: 河北雄安新区管理委员会

description.zh-cn: 河北雄安新区的行政管理机构。
description.en: The administrative management body of the Hebei Xiong'an New Area.

nodes.id: 中国共产党河北雄安新区工作委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党河北雄安新区工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在河北雄安新区的领导机关。
description.en: The leading party organ of the Communist Party of China in the Hebei Xiong'an New Area.

description.zh-cn: 位于河北省的中华人民共和国国家级新区，河北雄安新区公安局所在地。
description.en: A state-level new area of the People's Republic of China located in Hebei Province, and the location of the Hebei Xiong'an New Area Public Security Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 河北省雄安新区雄县的公安机关，受河北雄安新区公安局领导和指挥。
description.en: The public security organ of Xiong County, Xiong'an New Area, Hebei Province, which is led and commanded by the Hebei Xiong'an New Area Public Security Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 河北省雄安新区容城县的公安机关，受河北雄安新区公安局领导和指挥。
description.en: The public security organ of Rongcheng County, Xiong'an New Area, Hebei Province, which is led and commanded by the Hebei Xiong'an New Area Public Security Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 河北省雄安新区安新县的公安机关，受河北雄安新区公安局领导和指挥。
description.en: The public security organ of Anxin County, Xiong'an New Area, Hebei Province, which is led and commanded by the Hebei Xiong'an New Area Public Security Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 河北省保定市的公安机关，安增奇曾在此任职。
description.en: The public security organ of Baoding City, Hebei Province, where An Zengqi previously held a position.

description.zh-cn: 河北省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of Hebei Province.

description.zh-cn: 河北雄安新区公安局的内设机构。
description.en: An internal department of the Hebei Xiong'an New Area Public Security Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 担任河北雄安新区公安局首任局长。
description.en: Served as the first Director of the Hebei Xiong'an New Area Public Security Bureau.

position.zh-cn: 党委副书记、常务副局长
position.en: Deputy Secretary of the Party Committee, Executive Deputy Director

description.zh-cn: 在调任雄安新区公安局之前，安增奇曾任保定市公安局党委副书记、常务副局长。
description.en: Before being transferred to the Xiong'an New Area Public Security Bureau, An Zengqi served as Deputy Secretary of the Party Committee and Executive Deputy Director of the Baoding Public Security Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 河北雄安新区公安局是河北省公安厅的派出机构，在业务上受其领导。
description.en: The Hebei Xiong'an New Area Public Security Bureau is a dispatched agency of the Hebei Provincial Public Security Department and is under its operational leadership.

relationships.target: 河北雄安新区管理委员会

description.zh-cn: 河北雄安新区公安局受河北雄安新区管委会管理，且以新区管理为主。
description.en: The Hebei Xiong'an New Area Public Security Bureau is managed by the Hebei Xiong'an New Area Management Committee, with the New Area's management being primary.

relationships.target: 中国共产党河北雄安新区工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 河北雄安新区公安局受河北雄安新区党工委管理。
description.en: The Hebei Xiong'an New Area Public Security Bureau is managed by the Party Working Committee of Hebei Xiong'an New Area.

description.zh-cn: 河北雄安新区公安局领导和指挥雄县公安机关。
description.en: The Hebei Xiong'an New Area Public Security Bureau leads and commands the Xiong County public security organ.

description.zh-cn: 河北雄安新区公安局领导和指挥容城县公安机关。
description.en: The Hebei Xiong'an New Area Public Security Bureau leads and commands the Rongcheng County public security organ.

description.zh-cn: 河北雄安新区公安局领导和指挥安新县公安机关。
description.en: The Hebei Xiong'an New Area Public Security Bureau leads and commands the Anxin County public security organ.

description.zh-cn: 河北省人民政府为河北雄安新区公安局制发印章。
description.en: The Hebei Provincial People's Government issues the official seal for the Hebei Xiong'an New Area Public Security Bureau.

description.en: The Criminal Investigation Detachment is an internal department of the Hebei Xiong'an New Area Public Security Bureau.
